page.shortlink: api sql namespace result set object

property.name: RowCount
property.description: Default = 0. The number of rows in the result set. -1 If not known. Do not rely on this value, as not all drivers support it. Walk the ResultSet with .NextRow() instead.

property.name: CurrentRowIndex
property.description: Default = 0. The number of the current row.

property.name: CurrentRow
property.description: Returns the current row as an object.

property.name: ColumnInfo
property.description: An array of SQL::DataTypeInfo column descriptions.

property.name: ColumnCount
property.description: Default = 0. The number of columns in the result set.

property.name: CallResult
property.description: Detailed status of the result of the call.

property.name: TableInfo
property.description: Not always available. An array of SQL::TableInfo table descriptions returned by the query.

property.name: DBFRowSyntax
property.description: Default = "". The syntax required to create an Alpha Anywhere .DBF table with the same columns.

link.link: api more about the sql namespace result set object

links.link: More about the SQL ResultSet Object
